entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
